summary: input validation (CWE-20) in Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) version ELB prior to 2022-01-29 when "Legacy cache settings" is enabled
details: In Amazon Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) prior to 2022-01-29 when "Legacy cache settings" is enabled an input validation (CWE-20) vulnerability exists in the HTTP Header processing that can be attacked via the network (using a trailing space in the requests) resulting in HTTP Header Smuggling.
